name: com.nobunatelier.core
description:
A core collection of datastructure and game developement architecture use as a baseline for any game.  

For now it's a big mess, but once a better structure will be defined, I will split this package into more specialized ones.

# Core
- Scriptable Objects Data Definition/Collection
- Object Pooled Factory
- StateMachine

# Gameplay 
- Module based Controller/Character
- Game Manager, Mode with State

Makes use of Unity's InputSystem. 

For best results, use this text to summarize: 
▪ What the package does 
▪ How it can benefit the user 

Note: Special formatting characters are supported, including line breaks ('\n') and bullets ('\u25AA').
